Class CollisionRect

java.lang.Object
com.mygame.spacecatch.tools.CollisionRect
public class CollisionRect extends Object
Contains rectangular collision mechanic

    • collidesWithAnswer

      public int collidesWithAnswer(CollisionRect rect)
      Method containing collision check for multiple objects
      Parameters:
      rect - CollisionRect object with objects data
      Returns:
      returns value 1 if answer is good, 2 if answer is wrong, and 0 if there's no collision
